about_the_game:
Mr. Orange The Saint needs to collect all the vitamin cubes to become the healthiest holy Orange in the game. During his ball rolling quest, he will be finding missing pages about Bible passages to preach as a narrator to us the players. To teach us the teachings of God. You the player share this game who doesn't know about Christ? Or Mr. Orange The Saint. It's up to you the player to make Orange the healthiest saint.

Version 0.0.3 Includes:
- 10 Levels 3D modeled with no textures in them.
- 10 Bible Bonus Tracks. One in each level.
- Level selection
- Sound Options
- Red Box Patrolling Enemies
- Saving System

Controls:
Use WASD to roll and ESC to pause the game.

Rules:
- Avoid the red patrolling boxes or else you lose health to zero and it's game over.
- Collect all 12 vitamin cubes to beat the level.
- Collect the Missing Bible Passage pages before collecting all 12 vitamin cubes.

Bugs:
- The saving system is a little buggy? Sometimes it resets to a lower amount of levels you completed.
- Some Bible passage voice-over or text is not precise much like from the trailer?

Enjoy
detailed_description:
Mr. Orange The Saint needs to collect all the vitamin cubes to become the healthiest holy Orange in the game. During his ball rolling quest, he will be finding missing pages about Bible passages to preach as a narrator to us the players. To teach us the teachings of God. You the player share this game who doesn't know about Christ? Or Mr. Orange The Saint. It's up to you the player to make Orange the healthiest saint.

Version 0.0.3 Includes:
- 10 Levels 3D modeled with no textures in them.
- 10 Bible Bonus Tracks. One in each level.
- Level selection
- Sound Options
- Red Box Patrolling Enemies
- Saving System

Controls:
Use WASD to roll and ESC to pause the game.

Rules:
- Avoid the red patrolling boxes or else you lose health to zero and it's game over.
- Collect all 12 vitamin cubes to beat the level.
- Collect the Missing Bible Passage pages before collecting all 12 vitamin cubes.

Bugs:
- The saving system is a little buggy? Sometimes it resets to a lower amount of levels you completed.
- Some Bible passage voice-over or text is not precise much like from the trailer?

Enjoy

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11: El Capitan (Gala)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 2GB or more RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: High
  • Storage: 148 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game updates every 5-8 months. Due limited of one developer at the moment.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12: Sierra (Fuji)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 2GB or more RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: High
  • Storage: 148 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game updates every 5-8 months. Due limited of one developer at the moment.
